newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: New Clicks 10-month share beats forecast.
newsitem.headline: New Clicks 10-month share beats forecast.

text.p: Full name: New Clicks Holdings Ltd
NOTE - No comparative figures are provided as the company started operating on November 1, 1995.
Shareholders will be given the option of capitalisation shares in lieu of the dividend and terms will be published on October 21.
The group said it expected real growth in the year ahead and would open 48 new stores to bring its total number of stores to 400.
